Academic :octicon:`book;1em;sd-text-info`
=========================================

:bdg-info:`Academic`, :bdg-info-line:`Academic`

Main formation
--------------

- **2009**: Electronic Technician (ET28), secondary studies in electronic and programming.
- **2016**: Bachelorâ€™s degree in Atmospheric Sciences (UBA), applied physic.
- **2019**: Diploma in Technology and Management (UTN), new technologies and ways to generate energy.

Other courses
-------------

- **2014**: Analysis and processing of satellite images (INVAP).
- **2018**: How to communicate effectively (UTN).
- **2021**: Machine learning Python (IBM).
- **2021**: Cybersecurity (CISCO).
- **2022**: Deep Learning with Tensorflow (IBM).
- **2022**: Python for Data Science (IBM).
- **2022**: Data Analytics Professional Certificate (Google), analysis of data.

Publications
------------
